events.name: ReviewSubmitted
events.description: Captures when a customer submits a review.

events.name: ReviewEdited
events.description: Allows users to update their submitted reviews.

events.name: ReviewFlagged
events.description: Enables users to flag inappropriate reviews for moderation.

events.name: ReviewApproved
events.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been approved.

events.name: ReviewRejected
events.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been rejected.

commands.name: SubmitReview
commands.description: Captures when a customer submits a review.

commands.name: EditReview
commands.description: Allows users to update their submitted reviews.

commands.name: FlagReview
commands.description: Enables users to flag inappropriate reviews for moderation.

commands.name: ApproveReview
commands.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been approved.

commands.name: RejectReview
commands.description: Indicates that a flagged review has been rejected.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration point to fetch user information for reviews.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: Integration for notifying users about review status changes.
